name: Heaven Invaders
description:
That's game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 119: Heaven².

All what you have you can lose, even the interface!

 Try to protect your base and defeat the invader!

Meranolean - game design, code

ln404 - art design, game design

Egor Rychagov (TWC Mixing) - composer, sound designer

Rules:

You need to destroy the invader!

Expose the angels, gain your resources. Pay attention, you can click on some of the angels! End everything can die! :D

Press R on the level to reload it.
